From your morning coffee to your evening commute, TikTok has the videos to make your day. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a travel lover or simply looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. Enjoy an endless stream of short videos on things you love most. Watch what you like, skip what you don’t. 
 
WATCH
A personalised video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.  You'll find a variety of videos from Food and Fashion to Sports and DIY - and everything in between.

 
CREATE
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. As many times as you need.
Millions of creators on TikTok showcase their incredible skills and every day life. Let yourself be inspired.

Hey, we’re Hannes & Jeremy.

We’ve been there: Every game night starts with googling rules, grabbing pens and paper, or trying random apps. But there’s just no really good party app. So we decided to build one.

Our goal? Bring the best and most viral party games together in one place. For example: Who’s the Impostor? - you’ve probably seen it on TikTok or Insta.

Easy to learn. Quick to play. Perfect for 3 to 12 people.

Great for house parties, birthdays, or your next night with friends. Gather your crew - and have fun.

The app is free to enjoy with your friends! For some extra features, Splash Plus gives you full access with a weekly subscription. You can check out our Terms, EULA, and Privacy Policy here: https://cranberry.app/terms. 

Please note: This app is not intended for use as a drinking game and contains no alcohol-related content. It is suitable for all audiences seeking fun, social gameplay.

Cheers and enjoy the app!

Welcome to AnimalFace, the entertaining animal camera app on the iOS platform! With AnimalFace, you can discover which animal you resemble the most and create your very own electronic pet. Are you ready to unleash your animal instincts?
.

AnimalFace is not your typical animal camera app. With our advanced  technology, Do you want to know which animal you look most like? Come and use the magical animal-face function.That's not all! We take it a step further by providing you with a detailed analysis of the different animal species, including their personalities, psychological traits, and more. You'll learn about the animal kingdom like never before!


Now, imagine having your very own electronic pet based on the animal you resemble the most. With AnimalFace, you can do just that! Your electronic pet will be your loyal companion, and you can feed, wash, and play with them whenever you want.You can keep an eye on your pet's status and needs without even opening the app!


We also have an advanced AI dialogue model, which allows you to have a barrier-free dialogue with your virtual pet, establish a deeper emotional communication, and it can also answer various questions for you.

You can also use the adopted pet as the lockscreen,and you cancheck the status of the pet everytime you charge it.Dont hesitate,go

and see if your adopted kitten is lonely and needs company.By the way,there is also a super cute lockscreen component waiting for you to unlock,let your lockscreen move no longer tedious!



But don't just take our word for it. Here's what our users have to say:

I never knew I looked like a lamb until I downloaded AnimalFace. Now I can't stop playing with my electronic pet!" - John, 25

AnimalFace is so much fun! I love learning about different animal species and seeing which one I look like the most." - Rachel, 30

AnimalFace is the perfect app for animal lovers like me. I can interact with my electronic pet and chat with other users' pets. It's like having a virtual zoo at my fingertips!" - Sarah, 18


Whether you're a kid or a kid at heart, AnimalFace is the app for you! With our easy-to-use interface and fun features, you'll never be bored again. So what are you waiting for? Download AnimalFace today and discover your inner animal!

[Don't Miss Me When I'm Gone] After losing my parents, I move in with my godmother, Aunt Sandra. I live under her roof with her two sons-the Miller brothers-surrounded by love and care. I think I’ll end up with one of them. But everything changes when the maid’s daughter, Lola, moves in. The Miller brother I love most breaks my heart into pieces. After I leave, they lose their minds trying to find me.

[Move Aside! I'm the Final Boss] Kingsley is the secret King of King's Corps and the richest man on Earth, but when he returns from the battlefield, his childhood sweetheart brutally dumps him, thinking he's a clown. How will the King of all men make her regret it?

IN-APP PURCHASE, SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS:
We offer non-consumable in-app purchase and auto-renewing subscription options:
- Subscriptions length: monthly, Yearly

- You may turn off the auto-renewal of your subscription via your iTunes Account Settings. However, you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period
- Any unused portion of a free-trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.

Who's the imposter among your friends?
Imposter is the ultimate party game of bluffing, guessing, and social deduction. Grab 3-5 friends, sit around one device, and find out who’s lying.

How to Play:
1- All players see the same secret word—except one.
2- The imposter only sees the word “Imposter.”
3- One by one, players say a word related to the secret word.
4- The imposter must fake it and try to blend in without knowing the word.
5- Keep giving words and talking until someone thinks they've figured it out.

Fun, fast, and full of suspicion—perfect for game nights, road trips, or hanging out with friends.

Features:
- Play locally with 3 to 15 friends
- 10+ categories like food, movies, jobs, and more
- 500+ unique words and growing
- No accounts, no setup—just start playing
- Great for all ages—kids, teens, and adults

Built for laughs, bluffing, and epic "aha!" moments

Download now and start your next Imposter showdown!

Cluso - Impostor Party Game is the ultimate offline multiplayer social deduction game to play with friends! No WiFi, no accounts — just pure fun. Gather 3–10 players, pass your phone around, and see if you can spot the sneaky impostor before they discover the secret word. Perfect for parties, game nights, and family gatherings.

HOW TO PLAY
1. Slide up your card – Crew members see a secret word. The imposter only sees “IMPOSTOR.”
2. Give Clues – Each player says one clue related to the word. Be tricky enough to hide from the impostor, but clear enough for teammates to trust you.
3. Vote – Decide who looks most suspicious. Vote out the impostor — or continue another round of clues.
4. Win or Lose – If the crew finds the imposter, they win. If the imposter stays hidden or guesses the word, they win!

FEATURES
* Offline Multiplayer – Play anywhere, no internet required.
* Endless Replay – Hundreds of secret words across multiple categories.
* Party Classics Included – Bonus games like Bet Buddy, Transfer Roulette, Put a Finger Down, Fact or Fake, and Would You Rather.
* Quick Rounds – Fast, fun gameplay that keeps the party going.
* Easy Setup – No sign-in or registration, just open and play.

WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT
* The Perfect Party Game – Great icebreaker for friends, family, or coworkers.
* Social Deduction Fun – Test your bluffing, lying, and guessing skills.
* For Fans of Mafia & Werewolf – If you love Among Us, Mafia, or Liar Game, you’ll feel right at home.
* Brain-Teasing Gameplay – Give clever clues without exposing yourself to the impostor.

PRO VERSION
Unlock all categories, add your own custom words, and get fresh new content every week so the fun never ends!

Download Cluso – Imposter Party Game today and discover who among you is the best deceiver. The ultimate party, multiplayer, and offline impostor game — right in your pocket!

description:
Welcome to ShotShort!

Tired of endless scrolling and not knowing what to watch? ShotShort brings you a whole new way to enjoy entertainment — with high-quality short dramas designed for your busy life. Every episode is just a few minutes long, so you can dive into captivating stories anytime, anywhere, without the long commitment. Whether you’re commuting, on a coffee break, or relaxing before bed, ShotShort makes it easy to fit great storytelling into your day.

A World of Genres at Your Fingertips
From sweet and heartwarming romances to intense revenge thrillers, suspense-packed mysteries, family dramas, and even fantasy adventures — ShotShort has something for every mood. Our content library is always growing, giving you endless stories to explore. Love dramatic CEO romances, gripping werewolf tales, or emotional urban dramas? We’ve got it all, ready for you in cinematic HD quality.

Fresh Stories, Non-Stop
We add new episodes and series every week, so your watchlist will never run dry. Our intelligent recommendation system learns your tastes and guides you to your next favorite drama effortlessly — no more endless scrolling, just instant entertainment you’ll actually enjoy.

Immersive Viewing, Anywhere
Crystal-Clear HD Quality – Beautiful visuals and professional production bring every story to life.
Multilingual Subtitles – Enjoy dramas from around the world, in your language.
Sleek & Easy Navigation – Find what you want quickly, with an interface designed for effortless browsing.

Free to Enjoy, Your Way
ShotShort is completely free to watch, supported by ads so everyone can access our stories. Want an even smoother experience? An optional small subscription lets you remove ads entirely and watch without interruptions.

Why Choose ShotShort?
- Episodes just minutes long — perfect for on-the-go viewing
- New stories added weekly to keep things fresh
- Smart recommendations tailored to your interests
- Genres for every taste, from romance to fantasy
- Watch anytime, anywhere — all in stunning HD
Step into a world where big drama fits into small moments. With ShotShort, you’ll always have a new story waiting for you.

Download ShotShort today and start your next binge-worthy adventure — no matter how little time you have.

About Subscriptions
Auto-renewing subscription instructions:
1. Payment: The purchase will be charged to your iTunes account.
2. Renewal: Your Apple iTunes account will be charged within 24 hours before the subscription expires, extending your access for another cycle upon successful payment.
3. Cancellation: To cancel auto-renewal, disable the function in your iTunes/Apple ID settings at least 24 hours before the current subscription ends. If canceled within the last 24 hours, a renewal fee may still apply.
4. For more information, please see: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy Policy: https://www.mediaradiance.com/privacy.html
Application Terms of Service: https://www.mediaradiance.com/service_clause.html
Renewal: https://www.mediaradiance.com/renewal_agreement/
If you have any questions, email us contact@mediaradiance.com~
